title: Biden Administration Offers Plan to Get Addiction-Fighting Medicine to Pregnant Women
description: Pregnant women are more likely to die of a drug overdose than the average woman of childbearing age, but less likely to be accepted for medication-based treatment.
dc:creator: Emily Baumgaertner
category: Substance Abuse and Mental Health Services Administration
media:credit: Hilary Swift for The New York Times
